'''Michael Martinez''' (born [[1959]]) is one of the most well-known [[Tolkienist|scholars]] in regards to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s literary works. He first published ''[[Parma Endorion]]'' in [[1996]] and has published a vast array of essays over the years. Most of these can be read online via his [http://www.merp.com/essays/michael-martinez-1 section on MERP.com]. 

==Bilbiography==
===Books===
*[[1996]]: ''[[Parma Endorion]]''
*[[2000]]: ''Visualizing Middle-earth'' 
*[[2003]]: ''Understanding Middle-earth''.
*[[2014]]: ''Mindfaring through Middle-earth''
